topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d521e4636872088b620200#post_53d521e4636872088b620200
The thing they're forgetting is that none of the usa's presidents have been removed from office; Nixon resigned before he was removed from office.  The chances of them successfully impeaching and removing from office Obama is next to zero.  I think they're getting desperate.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d5234b6368724e79ec0100#post_53d5234b6368724e79ec0100

Absolutely. I like to think the GOP figures that this will give them a win and to stain the legacy of the US's first African-American President. I like to think that they hate him because he's actually doing things that _*WORK*_, besides my feelings that it's a little racially based now and then, like the birther BS.
